field.name: mode
field.descripton: Possible values are: - reset: Reset the modem to it's internal default configuration - online: Set the modem into online mode (network access) - offline: Set the modem into offline mode (no network access)

field.name: result
field.description: Maybe this field contains a result code as response to various messages. Meaning of the different values is current unknown. Possible values for this field are: - 26: seen as response to get_networklist_msg/set_mode_preference_msg in offline mode
